name: Ephemeris
description:
Ephemeris is a distant world populated only by memories. Fragments of a life story float like scattered particles, lost in the dreamscape. Explore the abstract world to discover meaning in the darkness and light. What brought you here? Where will you end up, and how do you get there? Is there still time?

Part first-person exploration, part text adventure, Ephemeris features a distinctive idiosyncratic art style and a lo-fi ambient-synth soundtrack, which combine with the ultra-minimal gameplay mechanic to conjure a dream-like atmosphere and a sense of slowly unfolding mystery.
